item.description:
Female entrepreneurs and business professionals, working moms, saucy social media mavens...all are welcome! Come to network, meet new friends, spread the word about your business or service..or just to share ideas.

Also included with be a pitch portion so that everyone can introduce themselves and tell the group about their business or service.

Drink specials will be available during happy hour
Light nibbles will be served

INCLUDES:
Semi-Private Space to Facilitate Pitch Portion
Party Platters


HOW IT WILL WORK:
7:00PM: Check in & Informal Networking

7:30 - 8:00 - Each attendee gives a 30 second pitch of their business, service or skills

8:00-9:30 PM: Targeted networking & socializing

Sync up with business professionals to promote yourself and your business. Explore new business opportunities, make business contacts and form strategic partnerships with other successful professionals, entrepreneurs and business owners. You`ll be able to mix and mingle freely with other attendees so you can meet as many other networkers as possible.



ADMISSION:
$5 in advance
$10 at the door
PRE-PAY HERE - http://bostonmoxieint...



CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Young Business Professionals
Boston Entrepreneurs
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Women in Business Networking Salon & Cocktail Hour
